thread.title: 23 Hall Passes From Teachers That Took It Too Far
thread.title_full: 23 Hall Passes From Teachers That Took It Too Far

author: Anonymous
title: 23 Hall Passes From Teachers That Took It Too Far
text:
23 Hall Passes From Teachers That Took It Too Far  00pm by Desi Jedeikin 
From funny test answers, to bizarre detention slips, it always helps when you can find something that makes school a little less stale. Teachers have figured that out as well, and have started making hall passes out of some pretty bizarre things. I guess that's one way to make sure kids aren't just goofing off and wasting time by constantly leaving class! Here's a look at some of the craziest! 1. Emma: CAN I go to the bathroomPerezp: take the big pass pic.twitter.com/bZX2MV0WjN
